about_the_game:
About the game

A visual novel about a couple trying to release tension and increase their sexual pleasure. Not knowing where to start and eager to know all the secrets of erotic massage, they turn to a specialist.

Visual Novel Description

Alina and Mateo, a very attractive young couple, were looking for new ways to make their private life much more exciting.
The two discovered online that couple massage can increase sexual stimulation when done properly.
Not knowing where to start and eager to know all the secrets of erotic massage, the two decided to turn to a specialist.
Ruby warned them that her methods are not conventional and that they could become jealous, but Alina and Mateo decided to try anyway.
Once she got to their home, Ruby began to put into practice what she knew on Alina's naked body, right under Mateo’s mesmerized gaze.
Things got heated up and the three of them ended up trying more than just releasing tension and decreasing stress.
